segments.text: Hello , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking for a host home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you stay with the host family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , at least half a year . Do I have to do my own grocery shopping ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Usually the host family prepares at least two meals a day for you .
segments.speaker: S1
